alert.note: Alert for Howard; Winneshiek (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 5:43PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Howard, northwestern Winneshiek and southwestern Fillmore Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 542 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lime Springs, or 8 miles northwest of Cresco. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and torrential rainfall with rates of 1 to 3 inches an hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cresco, Harmony, Lime Springs, Ridgeway, Bristol, York, Chester, Vernon Springs County Park, Vernon Springs, County Roads V 58 And A 46, Hutton, Bluffton, Davis Corners, County Roads W 14 And A 34, County Roads A 23 And V 58, Lylahs Marsh County Park, Saratoga, Maple Leaf, Bonair and Greenleafton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
